backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing UI updates, involved files, components, and test IDs for multiple frontend features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing App.tsx, global styles, and Tailwind config for the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens and theming variables for light/dark modes with global border and body utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering banner, faux YouTube-style header, mascot, and interactive rotating jokes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider handling Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining vibrant pink theme, creme gloss heading effect, footer text styling, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint wiring up React, Internet Identity provider, React Query, and global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, scanning project files, extending colors, animations, and utilities, and loading typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, features, requirements, and image needs for a joke website build.
